Text:
What does "Part 1" mean?
Is this only half of the 1945 movie?
Yes, only half for this moment. Part II will come, surely!
the film was split into two parts originally. this is possibly the greatest French film ever made.
thank you very much... indeed a masterpiece... impatiently waiting for part 2!...

Waiting for the second part!

thanks

Thanks for the clarification, Gabe.

I guess I will download this part and wait for the second one.
